comment: Ha! Thanks If I was thinking like an editor I would have waited until tomorrow (my official anniversary) for my jab, but damned if I was waiting another day!

            :ARG2 (c / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (w / wait-01

                        :ARG2 (j / jab-01

                        :time (u / until
                              :op1 (t2 / tomorrow

                                          :poss ii2))))
                  :ARG2 (d / damn-01

                                    :mod (a2 / another)))))
            :condition (t3 / think-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (e / editor)))))
